modName: SED7 nipplering piercings for CHSBHC BBP body
summary: This is a conversion of some nipple piercings from Shazhar - SED7 (http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/20655) to fit the CHSBHC BBP body mod.
descriptionHtml:
Hi everybody!

First of all, I\'m NOT a modder! And, besides, this is my first mod ever!


[b]DESCRIPTION[/b]. 
This is just a blender&nifskope conversion of some nipple piercings by Shazhar - SED7 (http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/20655) -CREDITS TO HIM!- to fit the CHSBHC BBP body (http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/4888).

I converted only the ring/gem piercings; these nipplerings now move accordingly to the breast physics (BBP) of the CHSBHC body.


[b]REQUIRED MODS[/b].
SED7 piercings (http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/20655).
CHSBHC body mod (http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/4888).


[b]INSTALLATION[/b]. 
To install the mod, you MUST have the 2 above mods installed, then just MANUALLY drop the contents of my directory into your Data\\Meshes\\SED7_Piercings folder and replace the existing meshes. [u]Do not use the NMM![/u] I told you, I\'m not a modder...


[b]OPTIONAL FILES[/b].
I started creating this mod basically to make the nipple-piercings fit the [b]CHSBHC topless daedric armor [/b] by White Rabbit (http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/7576), which I currently use (as you can see from the images). If you want the piercings to work with that armor, then [u]DO NOT install the main file[/u] but rather the optional file [b]\"SED7 nipplerings for topless CHSBHC daedric armor by White Rabbit\"[/b]. (You need, of course, to have the topless daedric armor mod installed too!).
I also uploaded a naked body texture with enlarged areolae (upon kind request by some guys in the nexus). Use it if you want your character look like mine in the images.


[b]UNINSTALLATION[/b].
Just reinstall the SED7 piercing mod with the NMM, and click \"yes\" when asked to overwrite.
Alternatively, you can delete my files manually from the Data\\Meshes\\SED7_Piercings folder (all the files beginning with \"SED7_CBBE3_fGNP\" and \"SED7_CBBE3_fSNP\").


[b]USAGE IN GAME[/b].
The nipplerings for CHSBHC work correctly with the CHSBHC naked body (as obvious!) and [b][i]SHOULD[/i][/b] work as well with most of the mods based on CHSBHC, such as:
 - CHSBHC BBP Snow Leopard Forsworn Armor NSFW by Apogee777 (http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/5209);
 - CHSBHC BBP Golden Elven Palace Armor NSFW by Apogee777 (http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/5648);
 - all the CHSBHC conversions, like \"CHSBHC Conversions with BBP\" by Nimbonius (http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/7475), \"-WIP-_NCHSBHC\" by Nimbonius (http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/22021), \"Dawnguard CHSBHC BBP conversions\" by Stonedhippos (http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/21958).
If you try and wear a non-CHSBHC armor together to my piercings, odd visual effects are likely to happen (piercings floating in the air in front of you and the like). They are just weird to look at, but don\'t cause any damage to your games.


[b]FUTURE PLANS[/b].
Converting the nippleshields; converting the piercings to CBBE with BBP.


[b]ACKNOWLEDGEMENTS[/b].
I want to thank SED7-Shazhar for his awesome piercing mod, CherryHotaling for her great jiggly body mod and White Rabbit for his daedric armor, which gave me the starting idea for this conversion (full credits go to them too). 
Besides, I want to thank all the modders in the nexus too, and Bethesda.

To everyone: YOU ARE ALLOWED TO DO WHAT YOU WANT WITH THIS MOD, [u]BUT[/u] you [u]MUST[/u] ask [u]Shazhar-SED7[/u] for permission first!!! (since the base meshes are of his own).

P.S. I forgot to thank newmiller for his bikinis (http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/19640), actually I had been working on his meshes before turning to CHSBHC in order to build this mod.

P.P.S. Thanks to Caliente too, who allowed me to upload the optional texture (see \"Downloads\"), which is a modification of a texture of his own.

P.P.P.S. [b]ENDORSE if you think I\'m not wasting my time!!! [/b]
author: Pyccolotta

files.name: SED7 nipplerings for topless CHSBHC daedric armor by White Rabbit
